metadata.description:
This token is connected to a real world painting making the purchaser of this token the official owner. The painting will be posted to the buyer after the necessary details are sent to:
TokenisedArt@protonmail.com
Artist: Dillan Powre
Artwork Title: Silver River
Completion Date: 6th of June 2019
Dimensions: 50x40cm (20x16in)
Medium: Acrylic paint mixed with polyvinyl acetate on cotton canvas
Country of Origin: Republic of Ireland
Artwork Number: PN001AG-SR

This Certificate of Authenticity verifies the legitimacy of this tokenized painting. The artist's signature on this document attests that the artist has personally hand crafted and signed this original painting. The painting represented in this token is the rightful property of the address in possession of this token unless otherwise specified or agreed upon by the token holder.
